metadata.dc:author: Villalobos Capriles, T
metadata.dc:description: Brief reference to the importance of science on the mankind progress is followed by the meanings of that word as "true knowledge" and as "systematically formed body of theories". Then the author develops his work, describing Dr. Trompiz as a genuine man of science in all his professional activities and proved through his numerous and wealthy publications.
metadata.dc:title: Gabriel Trompiz: hombre de ciencia y de investigacion.
[Gabriel Trompiz: man of science and investigation].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista de la Sociedad Venezolana de Historia de la Medicina
